metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10148 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The wp_ajax_update_plugin function in wp-admin/includes/ajax-actions.php in WordPress before 4.6 makes a get_plugin_data call before checking the update_plugins capability, which allows remote authenticated users to bypass intended read-access restrictions via the plugin parameter to wp-admin/admin-ajax.php, a related issue to CVE-2016-6896.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
